h1.base: margin: 32px 0 0; font-size: 2em; letter-spacing: -0.03em; line-height: 1.5; text-align: center;
h1.content: font-weight: bold; color: #c2410c; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #c2410c 0%, #ea580c 50%, #f97316 100%); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-clip: text;

h2.content: font-weight: bold; color: #ea580c; display: inline-block; border: 2px solid #ea580c; border-radius: 6px; padding: 4px 16px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #fff7ed 0%, #ffedd5 100%);

code.block: color: #333; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff7ed 0%, #ffedd5 100%); border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #fed7aa; box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(234,88,12,0.1); margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1em 1em 1em;  font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #ffedd5; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; color: #c2410c; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid #fed7aa;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #f97316; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px 16px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fff7ed 0%, #ffedd5 100%); margin: 0.8em 0; color: #c2410c; font-style: italic; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1em auto; display: block; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(234,88,12,0.2);
styles.link: color: #ea580c; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #fdba74; transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #fed7aa;
table.header: background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ea580c 0%, #f97316 100%); font-weight: bold; color: #ffffff; border-bottom: 2px solid #fb923c; font-size: 1em;

styles.hr: border: none; border-top: 3px solid #fdba74; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 2px;
